text: Janusz Mariusz Hajnos (27 August 1968 – 29 August 2019) was a Polish ice hockey player. He played for Podhale Nowy Targ, GKS Katowice, and KTH Krynica during his career. He also played for the Polish national team at the 1992 Winter Olympics. He led the Polish Ekstraklasa in goal scoring during the 1991–92 season. Hajnos died on 29 August 2019 in Nowy Targ, two days after his 51st birthday.https://sport.interia.pl/hokej/news-hokej-znakomity-napastnik- podhala-janusz-hajnos-nie-zyje,nId,3174496 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1968 births Category:2019 deaths Category:GKS Katowice (ice hockey) players Category:Ice hockey players at the 1992 Winter Olympics Category:KTH Krynica players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Poland Category:People from Nowy Targ Category:Polish ice hockey right wingers Category:Sportspeople from Lesser Poland Voivodeship
title: Janusz Hajnos
